Text: gas swap priceCharlespst Charlie Steve I work in the power structuring group and need your assistance in pricing a gas swap The details are as follows Jan Dec transco z priced at mid Im sure I am missing some inputs since I am new to this Please tell me what else I need to provide you Could you please give me one price with basis included and one without basis Thanks Steve x
